name: Osprey Porter 46 Backpack - Unisex
description:
A sleek travel pack for European tours and RTW adventures. The Porter 46 meets most carry-on restrictions, with burly compression straps to help you squeak by if it's a close call. The comfortable shoulder straps and hipbelt make it easy to shoulder your load, and they zip away behind a panel in case you're forced to gate-check. The main compartment opens like a suitcase for easy packing and unpacking, and a dedicated, padded laptop sleeve makes it easy to grab your laptop at airport security or once you reach your seat.Stowaway harness and hipbelt zip behind a panel for protection when you check your bag.Foam-padded shoulder straps and hipbelt have soft, breathable contact surfaces.Padded top and side handles provide comfortable carry in suitcase mode. Webbing loops let you attach a shoulder strap (sold separately).Large U-shaped zippered main compartment opens completely for easy access.Structural sidewalls hold your bag open, making it easy to pack and unload.Padded rear-access sleeve holds your 15in. laptop and tablet for quick access at security.Lots of interior and exterior pockets keep you organized.StraightJacket™ compression system with padded wings and lower panel secures and protects your gear.Main compartment and laptop sleeve have lockable zippers.

        Sustainability
